comments:
I created a Dynamic Web project, added an HTML, JSP, and Web service. That all worked correctly. I closed the workspace, reopened it a day later and tried to add a new servlet using the wizard. I selected the doGet method only. The wizard did a little work, then failed with the following exception:

Dialog box: 

An error has occurred when Create Servlet finished.

Details:

When I dismissed the error dialog I saw that the servlet java source was created and opened in the editor. The project has a red x and the Problems view shows:

Severity and Description	Path	Resource	Location	Creation Time	Id
CHKJ3000E: WAR Validation Failed: org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.exception.DeploymentDescriptorLoadException: WEB-INF/web.xml		Project1	Unknown	1149276517117	17
I checked web.xml and it was not updated with the new servlet mapping.

Created an attachment (id=43386)
.log file showing Add Servlet failure
I noticed that in the Project Explorer, the Deployment Descriptor node was missing. Sounds like a problem with the deployment descriptor.

Duplicate of https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=143229

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 143229 ***
